name: webGefährte Custom Functionality Plugin
upgrade_notice: Syncs custom functionality across websites of the online marketing community.
author: Jan (webGefährte)

sections.description:
Custom Functionality Plugin enhances websites of members with a set of custom features and functions. This plugin is designed to be a flexible and robust solution for adding custom code, improving site performance, and extending theme functionality.

Key features include:

  • Custom post types and taxonomies
  • Shortcodes for dynamic content
  • Enhanced security features
  • Custom widget and sidebar management
sections.installation:
To install the Custom Functionality Plugin, follow these steps:

  1. Download the latest version of the plugin from the repository.
  2. Navigate to Plugins > Add New in your WordPress dashboard.
  3. Click on Upload Plugin and select the downloaded ZIP file.
  4. Click Install Now, then Activate the plugin.
  5. Optional: Configure the plugin settings according to your needs in the Settings > Custom Functionality menu.

sections.custom_section:
Custom Section: Advanced Configuration

This section provides advanced configuration options for developers. You can customize the behavior of this plugin by using filters and action hooks. For detailed documentation, please refer to the official documentation.

Example usage:

add_filter('custom_functionality_option', function($value) { return 'new_value'; });
